text: Romance on the High Seas is a 1948 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by Michael Curtiz and starring Jack Carson, Janis Page, Don DeFore, Doris Day, Oscar Levant, Fortunio Bonanova, Eric Blore, Leslie Brooks. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1949. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1948 musical movies Category:1948 romantic comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Romance on the High Seas
